com.example.nerdherd.Database

Class LocalUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.nerdherd.Database.LocalUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProfileManager.ProfileCreateEventListener

    public class LocalUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProfileManager.ProfileCreateEventListener
    This stores all local data needed by the user along with some convenience data Contains the userId of the phone, custom barcode mappings, and subscribed experiments

        Returns:
        GeoPoint - Firebase.GeoPoint object containing the Longitude and Lattitude of the last location.

        Returns:

      • addRegisteredBarcode

        public static boolean addRegisteredBarcode(java.lang.String barcodeData,
                                           java.lang.String codeData,
                                           int overwrite,
                                           boolean save)
        Adds a barcode to our local storage which we will now associate with a certain experiment+outcome
        Parameters:
        barcodeData - String - barcode data retreieved from the codescanner
        codeData - String - new code data in the format "experimentId:outcome"
        Returns:
        Boolean - returns true if barcode doesn't already exist. Can't have a barcode trigger multiple trial outcomes

      • setMockDBUsed

        public static void setMockDBUsed()
        When set to true, does not save any data, and loads all empty maps for subscribed experiments custom barcode maps, and userId=0
